Plot: When her husband is taken hostage by his striking employees, a trophy wife (Deneuve) takes the reins of the family business and proves to be a remarkably effective leader. Business and ...
Title: Potiche
Writer: François Ozon (scenario), Pierre Barillet (play), Jean-Pierre Grédy (play)
Actors: Catherine Deneuve, Gérard Depardieu, Fabrice Luchini, Karin Viard
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 2 wins & 10 nominations.
